entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 20. Wind chill near minus 31. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening then light after midnight. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 31 this evening and minus 41 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly sunny. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 34 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Thursday 16 February 2023
